overview: Allu, Omar, and Surya are three close friends who go for a journey with a special aim. In an accident they are saved by Zacharia who seems to have a different personality. The three friends have to stay at Zacharia’s bungalow at certain special circumstances. Zacharia’s bungalow is on a hilltop. He is a person with no specific aim in life and is in his 60s. There the three friends come across a beautiful girl named Sicily Thomas who seems to have many secrets. They all were attracted to Sicily. It is at this time that two police officers, ACP Zakeer Ali and CI Koshy, reach the bungalow in search of Allu, Omar, and Surya. The following investigative events are narrated in a suspense filled way in ‘Gamer’. ‘Gamer’ is written and directed by debutante M R Anoop Raj. Devadevan, Arjun, and Basil do the roles of the three friends.
title: Gamer
